column5: Anyone know where I can get these housings for a Magnum 10A Cannon downrigger?The motors work great as does the rest of the rigger, but the housing is so old that it is disintegrating and it won't hold the motor in place.     Thanks
BAY DISTRIBUITORS in North Bay, Ontario  119 Progress Court North Bay, Ontario P1B 8G8 Phone: 705-476-6010

try finding a cannon warranty centre closer to your area or contact the company directly  you could try mike's reel repair out in chilliwack, bc...he warranties scotty's and penn, minn kota, motor guide, and i'm pretty sure cannon, he knows his stuff or he could definitely help you in the right direction  maybe ebay?
This might be of some help, unforunately some of your pieces may be discontinued  http://www.fish307.com/mag10a2006andolder.aspx
I had a bad experience with that guy. Never sent parts, wouldn't return my money and wouldn't respond to email or phone calls. It was only $16.00 but I spread the word any chance I get.
